alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 24 at 2:55PM MDT until March 26 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Locally higher amounts are possible in the central Wind River Basin. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Wind River Basin and Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 6 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel could be difficult, especially overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lander Foothills; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin
